page.title: 12The Forest Keeper.
page.content: The duties of a New Forest Keeper are many and varied.He is responsible for {recreation,enforcement of by-laws}and the overseeing of all aspects of{ {wildlife.}There are many pressures on The New Forest in the 1980's,especially the massive influx of visitors to the area.He has to control the illegal camping of people and ensure they are aware of the by-laws.The population of{Grey {Squirrels}is kept down by{culling,}as is the numbers of deer,rabbits and hares.He is also very much concerned with the preservation of the ecology as there are many types of wild flowers etc.which are in danger of extinction.One of the rarest snakes to be found on{Plain Heath}is the{Smooth {Snake,}a harmless,non-venomous variety.
